Utterance: Korchen? Bhal, jijnasha korar jonno dhonno-bad. Ami aapnake aapnar smriti somporke kichu prashna korte chai. Monoyog sahakare shun. Ami tin ti shobd bolte jachchi. Ami pora bondho korar pore aapni tader phire bolben. Ekhane tara dudh, age buddhiman. Ekhon amar kache sei kothagulo punoravritti korun.
Ekhon ei kothagulo mathay rakho. Ami aapnake koyek minute er modhye seguli aabar bolte bolbo. Thik aache?
Ami janotam na er ekta nam ache. Thik ache.
Ami aapnake mone rakhtam sei tin ti shobd ki chhilo?
Ekhon ami chai aapni 100 theke saat ti biyog korun tarpor protiti uttor theke saat ti biyog korate thakun jatokkhon na ami aapnake thamte boli. 100 ne jao.
Ekhon ami aapnake ami ja boli ta punoravritti korte boli. Prostut? Eta ekta sundor, rodrojjwal din, kintu khub ushno. Ekhon tumi bolo.
Ekti sundor rodrojjwal din ebong eti ushno.
Monoyog diye shunun, karon ami aapnake kichu korte bollam. Ei chhobiguli dekho ebong borter dik theke nirdeosh koro. Tarpor borgokhetre nirdeosh koro. Aar tarpor tribhuj nirdeosh koro.
Doya kore eti ja korte bole ta koro. Thik ache.
Khali kagojer tukrotoi boshano korar age aapni aapnar jonno ekta kagoj dial khoje paben, doya kore ekta bakyo likhun. Ami etta dekhi. Dhonnobad.
Anugroho kore ei nakshati anulipi koro, aapni eti dhore rakhte paren. Bhalo
Kathleen, eto poriksha'r shesh. Ami aapnake dhonnobad janate chai eti khub sahayok chhilo.
